name: JUST A HORROR SHOOTER GAME
description: JUST A HORROR SHOOTER GAME is a Game where you shoot the Monster. But you can't shoot it if the Monster has white eyes. I started this Project Yesterday, and this was made on Scratch. The thing is I've always wanted to see a Scratch Horror Game, not the FNAF Fan Games. This works if have Scratch Studio. Just load in the Project into the System. Just a Horror Shooter Game on Scratch (mit.edu) Updated Ver on Scratch.
